titleStmt.title: The famous & renowned history of Morindos a king of Spaine who maryed with Miracola a Spanish witch: and of their seauen daughters, (rightly surnamed ladies with bleeding hearts:) their births, their liue and their deaths. A history most wonderfull, strange, and pleasant to the reader.

The famous & renowned history of Morindos a king of Spaine who maryed with Miracola a Spanish witch: and of their seauen daughters, (rightly surnamed ladies with bleeding hearts:) their births, their liue and their deaths. A history most wonderfull, strange, and pleasant to the reader.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for H R[ockett] and are to be solde at his shop in the Poultrie vnder Saint Mildreds Church,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The history of king Morindos & Miracola a Spanish witch.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
